text: Spike TV ’ s Twitter account is ripping its own channel ’ s programming Ahead of the cable channel ’ s rebranding into the Paramount Network, the social media account has turned into a cascade of profane mockery of the network that ’ s targeted young male viewers since 2003 with shows like The Ultimate Fighter, 1, 000 Ways to Die, and COPS reruns. Yes, this is a deliberate PR stunt, but the jokes still work. Here ’ s the best of them ( NSFW language ) : There ’ s a reason all our early shows were CSI, UFC, TNA, MXC, UTI. No one around here knew how to read. — SPIKE ( @ spike ) January 16, 2018 My favorite number is 329 because it ’ s the number of times COPS
